name: politico
text:
Thursday's jobs report will likely look great on paper: Millions of jobs added in June as states reopened. But those numbers are a deceiving bump. 

The reality of the job market is likely far bleaker

name: politico
text:
Online donors poured a record $392 million into campaigns and causes via ActBlue in June, a sign of surging activism and political enthusiasm on the left that smashed the previous monthly high, from just before the 2018 election, by a whopping 50%

name: politico
text:
